mapper.select: select mg_id,mg_name,mg_pwd,mg_time,role_name,mg_mobile,mg_email,mg_state from sp_manager left join sp_role on sp_manager.role_id = sp_role.role_id

mapper.update: update sp_manager set mg_state = #{status} where mg_id = #{id}
